players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "Let's work together to solve this case. I am the mafioso and I killed Diana last night, but that doesn't mean she was innocent. We need to gather more information and discuss our findings."
You: "Bob, I don't believe you. If you were the mafioso, why would you confess so easily? You're trying to manipulate us into trusting you."
